order.bgnAmount: Amount of BGN you want to spend
order.bchAmount: Estimated amount of BCH you will receive
order.exchangeRateTerms: I understand exchange rate is recalculated at payment time
header.heading: Buy BCH powered by POYPE
currentOrder.amount: You are buying BCH for {amount} BGN.
currentOrder.confirmation: Are you sure you want to start over? This will reset all progress up to this point.
photo.typeId: Please upload a photo of your ID in PNG or JPEG format
photo.typeFace: Please upload a selfie in PNG or JPEG format
photo.typeDeclaration: Please upload a photo copy of your declaration form in PNG or JPEG format
bchapi.error.general: Unexpected error. Please contact system administrator.
bchapi.error.getRate: Unable to retrieve BGN-BCH exchange rate. Please try again later.
bchapi.error.badRequest: Incorrect data entered. Please check and try again. Error message is: {errorMessage}
bchapi.error.notEnoughBch: Insufficient  BCH reserves in the service to fulfil the order. Please decrease the amount or try again later
bchapi.error.phoneNumber: Phone number is not formed correctly. Please follow the example: +359888123456
bchapi.error.validationCode: Validation code is invalid. Please check and try again.
bchapi.error.photoFormat: Photo is of wrong format. Please check and try again.
